## ContextView.on() method

The "refresh" event is emitted when the view is refreshed as bindings are added/removed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(eventName: 'refresh', listener: () => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | 'refresh' | The name of the event - always <code>refresh</code>. |
|  listener | () =&gt; void | The listener function to call when the event is emitted. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
